ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hate Lists
ygData.msgSnippet: I have had a dickens of a time fighting Hornets in Burning Woods.  My Guildmates love the place and have been spending a lot of time there.  I m not sure if
ygData.messageBody:
I have had a dickens of a time fighting Hornets in Burning Woods. My
Guildmates love the place and have been spending a lot of time there. I'm
not sure if something changed (patch-wise or our tactics) but the first
several times I was there everything went great.

Last week - when I'm around they seem to go Aggro like Songer described.
This is fighting near the Hornets nest. Every time I grouped in BW I died
at least once - once twice. And it's a tough zone to find a rez.

I'm sticking to Outside Fironia. I've only died there twice - both times
basically my fault. Once when away from group on a corpse locate - and
another when we only had 4 in group - and I thought I could run to zone -
when Paladin would have LoH - but I was too far away..

Anyway - the loot is possibly better in BW - I once looted a 51 Wizard
spell (lost it in lotto) - the best I've seen outside Karnor's is a Black
Pearl..

Slyde 43 of Xegony
